ModMetaData.name: WikiRim
ModMetaData.author: Neronix17
ModMetaData.description: A comprehensive help database, this is a fork of the original "HelpTab", updated to 1.0/1.1 and added changes such as listing humanoid races instead of pawnKinds under "Humanoids". See the Steam page for a full listing of changes. A full rewrite is being worked on, this is only kept here as a functional alternative in the meantime. Don't expect support unless it's a critical issue. Credits: - 1.0/1.1 Update and Changes by Neronix17 - 17 Update by NotFood - A16 Update by Skyarkhangel - Original mod by Fluffy
